item.description:
9/11: LET'S GET EMPIRICAL is David Ray Griffin's recent video release based on his book "Debunking 9/11 Debunking." It brilliantly rebuts Popular Mechanics and other defenders of the official conspiracy theory, and shows how their arguments do not stand up to empirical analysis.

Pointing out that most objections to the alternative theory, according to which 9/11 was an inside job, are based on purely a priori arguments and a propagandistic use of the term ?conspiracy theory,? he shows that if we get empirical about 9/11, we can quickly see that the official story cannot be true. - Generously illustrated with graphics and video clips. This one hour film also includes an additional 30 minutes of Q & A.

The film screening will begin at around 7:00 PM following an organizing meeting beginning at 6:00 PM. It is OK to bring food to the meeting. During the meeting we will decide on future films, events, and actions.

Following the film we will open the venue to discussions. At our last Meetup, Frank from Berkshire 9/11 Truth mentioned that their showing the History Channels put-down-film of the 9/11 Truth movement actually did more to convince attendees of Government complicity than the new Loose Change film. So, we will consider, if we get a copy, to screen this film too.. if decided by the group at our meeting, and if we get a copy in time.

[This event is organized by Jonathan Mark, Valley 9/11 co-founder with Stepen Goodale]
item.why: David Ray Griffin is a leading spokesperson for questioning the government's version of what happened on 9/11. It can help unite those against war and government corruption.
item.name: 9/11: LET'S GET EMPIRICAL - film & discussion!
